text: The 2005 World Series was the championship series of Major League Baseball's (MLB) 2005 season. The 101st edition of the World Series, it was a best-of- seven playoff between the American League (AL) champion Chicago White Sox and the National League (NL) champion Houston Astros. The White Sox beat the Astros in four games, winning their third World Series championship and their first in 88 years. The series was played between October 22â€“26, 2005. ==References== Category:World Series Category:Chicago White Sox Category:Houston Astros Category:2000s in Chicago
title: 2005 World Series
